species.name: shroodle
descriptions: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.
To keep enemies away from its territory, it paints markings around its nest using a poisonous liquid that has an acrid odor.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

abilities.name: pickpocket
abilities.effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.

abilities.name: prankster
abilities.effect: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.
